original_title: Les tonnes de l'audace - Mission Ténéré Tchad
overview: Film diary of the famous Berliet Company expedition between November, 1959 and January, 1960. This mission, composed of historians, ethnologists, geologists, botanists and zoologists, is the first motorized expedition between Algeria and Chad, on lands still unexplored from Djanet to Lake Chad. The team collected valuable information on the prehistory of Ténéré and the resources of its soil.
title: Les tonnes de l'audace - Mission Ténéré Tchad
